UniprotID	P07098-4
Accession	P07098;B7Z723;F5H1P4;Q2M1P6;Q5VXI7;Q5VXI8;Q658L8
EntryName	LIPF_HUMAN
ProteinName	Gastric triacylglycerol lipase (GL) (Gastric lipase) (EC 3.1.1.3)
GeneName	LIPF
Length	375
Function	Catalyzes the hydrolysis of triacylglycerols to yield free fatty acids, diacylglycerol, monoacylglycerol, and glycerol (PubMed:10358049, PubMed:2243091). Shows a preferential hydrolysis at the sn-3 position of triacylglycerol (PubMed:2243091).
